show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #38 Jessica Gnad "Regeneration 2.0"
subtitle: #38 Jessica Gnad "Regeneration 2.0"
summary:
Our friend Jessica Gnad joins us today to talk about Regeneration 2.0, the fragility of complex supply chains and the residual chemical load that many of us are walking around with.

Jess leads us on her own personal journey of how she discovered regenerative ag, and what about it makes her so passionate.
